Grangerdoryctes niger
– Belokobylskij 2005: 208. —
Yu et al. 2016
. —
Jasso-Martínez et al. 2019: 167
.

MADAGASCAR • ♀ ; “Madagascar, Bekily, reg. sud de l’ile”, “Museum Paris,
X.38
, A. Seyrig ”, “25”, “Type”, “ Holotypus
Aivalykus niger Granger 1949
”, “
Grangerdoryctes niger (Granger)
, det. Belokobylskij , 2002”; MNHN .

The complete description of a single currently known specimen ( holotype ) of this species was published by Belokobylskij (2005). We have not examined any additional specimen of this species for description of possible morphological variation in
G. niger
.
